title: Thanks Riot Games for these changes!!!
body:
I just want to say a HUGE thank you to riot games, this game is so hard to put down so I'm so glad they took all sense of progression out of it.
I've been trying to purchase kayn for the last 52 games, and guess what, after 8 level ups and disenchanting 10 champ shards (i had 2 prior to this new system) Im ONLY 7 IP away!!
I'm just so glad i get to play another 25 games before I get that 7 IP because the old system it would have been only ONE game (and wheres the fun in that!!!)
So GREAT JOB RIOT KEEP THE GREAT CHANGES COMING, I can't wait to grind through my next 572 games to get wukong!!!!

replies.body:
52 games, avarage 75 ip but lets make it 100, so you cant complain in anyway, its 75 tho, only first win of day is 250 ish.

But ye lets take 100 ip each game avarage, that's 5200 You arent even close to 6300 for kayn youll still need 11 more games (normaly more cuz its less then 100 but sure in the case) so you said you need 20 more games to get the that 7 ip? yup would be the same in old system ;) 

just feels slower but actually gives more. just trying to clear things for you hope it helps :)

You also have to take into account the amount of blue essence you earn is complete rng. Like I've gotten 3 450 champions, aka 90 essence each, 3 levels in a row which is around 30-45 games for a little over 450 essence. Even if I got 6300 champions for 3 levels I'd still only have enough essence for a 3175-4800 champion assuming I didn't want any of the shards I got.

this is completely irrelevant, my point was that it takes way too long to get a champ i WANT (lets also throw in the fact that i started at 3500ish ip) so 52 games later ive gained less than 2800 ip nearly half of what you claim it used to be, if you're gonna try to use numbers at least make sure you have them all before you try.

ALSO ive been getting some of the higher tier champs in some of my rerolls so there is also the potential for it to take even LONGER than it has so far.

so not only is the system slower than the old one, the rng has the potential to force some players to take WAY longer than normal to unlock a champ

also my last 8 games without any ingame currency progression have been very rewarding, i sincerely am enjoying no progression even more than i thought i would.
lmao the consequences of these changes are actually hilarious. I think it only takes u that long to level up because you haven't hit level 30 yet {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
or maybe you just don't see the obvious sarcasm that is his post xD
